chunk:
Medusa's Make-up Toner, Cucumber

Brand: Medusa's Make-up

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Organic Aloe Leaf Juice, Cucumber Fruit Water, Phenoxyethanol, Witch Hazel Water, Glycerin, Organic White Willow Bark Extract, Tea Tree Leaf Oil, Polysorbate 20, Organic Alcohol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
